languages.text: "Провести очистительные литургии на палубах, занятых беженцами. Изгоним зло силой своей веры!"
"Perform cleansing liturgies on the decks housing the refugees. We shall banish this blight with the strength of our faith!"
languages.original_text: "Провести очистительные литургии на палубах, занятых беженцами. Изгоним зло силой своей веры!"

traits.locale_text: "Perform cleansing liturgies on the decks housing the refugees. We shall banish this blight with the strength of our faith!"
"Perform cleansing liturgies on the decks housing the refugees. We shall banish this blight with the strength of our faith!"
"Perform cleansing liturgies on the decks housing the refugees. We shall banish this blight with the strength of our faith!"

"Perform cleansing liturgies on the decks housing the refugees. We shall banish this blight with the strength of our faith!"

languages.text: 「難民を収容しているデッキで浄化の儀式を執り行え。信仰の力で、この災いを振り払うのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Perform cleansing liturgies on the decks housing the refugees. We shall banish this blight with the strength of our faith!"

traits.locale_text: 「難民を収容しているデッキで浄化の儀式を執り行え。信仰の力で、この災いを振り払うのだ！」

languages.text: “在收容难民的甲板上举行净化仪式，我们要用信仰的力量驱散这场灾难！”
languages.original_text: "Perform cleansing liturgies on the decks housing the refugees. We shall banish this blight with the strength of our faith!"

traits.locale_text: “在收容难民的甲板上举行净化仪式，我们要用信仰的力量驱散这场灾难！”

languages.text: « Tenez des cérémonies liturgiques sur les ponts qui abritent les réfugiés. Nous allons bannir ce fléau par la force de notre foi ! »
languages.original_text: "Perform cleansing liturgies on the decks housing the refugees. We shall banish this blight with the strength of our faith!"

traits.locale_text: « Tenez des cérémonies liturgiques sur les ponts qui abritent les réfugiés. Nous allons bannir ce fléau par la force de notre foi ! »

languages.text: «Celebren liturgias de purificación en las cubiertas que alojan a los refugiados. ¡Desterraremos este maleficio con el poder de nuestra fe!».
languages.original_text: "Perform cleansing liturgies on the decks housing the refugees. We shall banish this blight with the strength of our faith!"

traits.locale_text: «Celebren liturgias de purificación en las cubiertas que alojan a los refugiados. ¡Desterraremos este maleficio con el poder de nuestra fe!».

languages.text: "Führt auf den Decks, auf denen die Flüchtlinge untergebracht sind, reinigende Liturgien durch. Wir werden dieser Seuche mit der Stärke unseres Glaubens begegnen."
languages.original_text: "Perform cleansing liturgies on the decks housing the refugees. We shall banish this blight with the strength of our faith!"

traits.locale_text: "Führt auf den Decks, auf denen die Flüchtlinge untergebracht sind, reinigende Liturgien durch. Wir werden dieser Seuche mit der Stärke unseres Glaubens begegnen."

languages.text: "Mültecilerin barındığı güvertelerde arınma ayinleri gerçekleştirin. İnancımızın gücü vasıtasıyla bu kirliliği bertaraf edeceğiz!"
languages.original_text: "Perform cleansing liturgies on the decks housing the refugees. We shall banish this blight with the strength of our faith!"
